name: INSTINCT (itch) (skyrimpro38)
description:
This was a minor success I guess In this game you are put into the shoes of an unknown character who needs to explore 3 areas of play the asylum being the 3rd area of play in which you need to find 3 keys to escape. This game is my partner's and my 1st ever unity game the game is a bit bugged and you may run into long loading times so sorry about that.  Anyway I hope you all enjoy don't hate to mutch

The trailer will be out on Monday sometime I hope...
